Class PreviewPanelManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.ui.PreviewPanelManager
public class PreviewPanelManager extends Object
Manages the display of next brick previews and the held brick in the UI.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PreviewPanelManager(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane nextPanel1, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane nextPanel2, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane nextPanel3, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane holdPanel)
    Constructs a new PreviewPanelManager.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    renderAllPreviews(ViewData data)
    Renders all preview panels (upcoming bricks and held brick) based on the provided game data.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • PreviewPanelManager

      public PreviewPanelManager(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane nextPanel1, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane nextPanel2, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane nextPanel3, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane holdPanel)
      Constructs a new PreviewPanelManager.
      Parameters:
      nextPanel1 - The GridPane for the first next brick preview.
      nextPanel2 - The GridPane for the second next brick preview.
      nextPanel3 - The GridPane for the third next brick preview.
      holdPanel - The GridPane for the held brick preview.

  • Method Details

    • renderAllPreviews

      public void renderAllPreviews(ViewData data)
      Renders all preview panels (upcoming bricks and held brick) based on the provided game data. Delegates to renderNextPreviews and renderHoldPreview.
      Parameters:
      data - The ViewData object containing the current game state information.
